response.homeDescription: This home blends one of the most desired locations in Hillcrest with the best 1 bedroom floorplan in Atlas. The huge balcony makes the home feel even more spacious and is something not normally found in a condo. What a great place to relax or entertain! Tastefully upgraded cabinets, granite counters & shower surround, hip kitchen backsplash, and beautiful hardwood floors make this a place you will love calling home. Atlas offers terrific amenities including pool/spa, fitness center, & social lounge. Call Chris Hein at 858-775-4346 for more information or to view this property.
response.whatOwnerLoves: * Location, location, location! This home is right in the heart of Hillcrest. Walk to restaurants, nightlife, shopping, Balboa Park. * Secure building offers gated underground parking and additional storage. * Feels very spacious for a one bedroom. * Tastefully upgraded and move-in ready. * Complex amenities: There is a great pool, spa, fitness center, and huge social lounge/community room where you can host fabulous parties. * Close to public transportation * Very hip and urban environment. * Large kitchen with plenty of cabinet and counter top space. * FHA and VA approved complex provides plenty of loan options.
